Transcription for 1725516

My first friend was a girl called Becky Hogue. I've known her since play school.
Probably first thing I remember about them is being at play school together.
The slides and games and things. I knew them in school up till year seven.
We're good friends because our parents knew each other.
Our parents are still good friends with each other and we're still in touch.
Because of the distance, because I'm around 250-300 miles from where Becky lives,
we quite often communicate on social media, Facebook, sometimes I haven't found all Twitter
but mostly Facebook. I've lived in Somerset for the first two and a half years of my life
and the rest of the time I've lived in Dorset and more recently North Wales.
